data.lyric:
[ti:Death Ain't Easy (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Death Ain't Easy (Explicit) - Lil Durk
[00:00.89]Lyrics by：Durk Banks/Joshua Samuel/Henry Lotas-Sherratt/Giovanni Rana
[00:01.79]Composed by：Durk Banks/Joshua Samuel/Henry Lotas-Sherratt/Giovanni Rana
[00:02.69]Turn me up Josh
[00:05.49]Alright 'cause he really a ho
[00:06.93]Ayo Vani
[00:07.27]Like he really like
[00:08.01]You know they probably told him
[00:08.88]Like you know when we came in uh
[00:09.88]Ayy Young Cutta turn up
[00:10.43]He got up outta there when we was in Cali and s**t
[00:12.02]We came and then he tried to shake my hand with love
[00:14.83]Like that's the second I told him another time
[00:16.51]Told him we 'bout to get on his a*s have him duckin' and s**t
[00:20.57]Who told me death is easy
[00:25.16]Who told me death is easy
[00:31.08]Like why you leave me
[00:34.45]Why you tell me
[00:35.92]Why you tell me that death is easy
[00:41.24]They ain't bleed like we bleed
[00:43.28]Sheroid was a cool n***a
[00:45.81]A real n***a not a stoop pigeon
[00:48.36]I hate J Money move loose with it
[00:50.99]He the one that's out the roof with it
[00:53.71]You think you tough you got your clip extended
[00:56.24]Been on my own I'm feelin' independent
[00:58.89]I love you too but I don't know your feelings
[01:01.57]You ain't gotta tell me 'cause I know the difference
[01:04.38]I wash my pain away with painkillers
[01:06.99]No new friends I'm with the same n***as
[01:09.65]Came from nothin' you see what fame get us
[01:12.35]They went to jail to kill the main n***as
[01:15.70]Baby mama realer than some day ones
[01:18.16]I gotta stash the drugs whenever they come
[01:20.69]I made "Dis Ain't What U Want" inside the basement
[01:23.26]Stayed alive inside the trenches yeah I made it
[01:25.82]What's-his-name would've been around but he hate it
[01:28.59]I fell off with my sound and they faded
[01:31.22]Look at me now I'm s**ttin' in they faces
[01:33.96]Them billions close around I can taste it
[01:36.35]B***hes stealin' kids they tryna take 'em out my testicles
[01:39.05]I was f**kin' strippers I was actin' unprofessional
[01:41.55]Lookin' at my son and I tell him "I'ma better you"
[01:44.29]And that s**t we doin' we get caught we goin' federal
[01:46.98]I won't say it no more you get Dior you actin' sexual
[01:49.56]All the opps unhealthy but I know a couple vegetable
[01:52.52]Leave me alone I don't wanna talk no more
[01:55.17]And I found myself I ain't feelin' lost no more
[01:57.67]Good weed with the Coldarin don't make me cough no more
[02:00.49]The reason n***as dyin' it ain't my fault no more
[02:03.18]He don't love his block he not a boss no more
[02:05.73]He died off the pill I don't wanna pop no more
[02:07.80]Who told me death is easy
[02:11.86]Who told me death is easy
[02:17.80]Like why you leave me
[02:20.93]Why you tell me
[02:22.36]Why you tell me that death is easy
[02:28.04]They ain't bleed like we bleed
[02:38.33]They ain't bleed like we bleed
[02:49.01]They ain't bleed like we bleed
data.trans:
[ti:Death Ain't Easy (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.89]//
[00:01.79]//
[00:02.69]Turn Me Up Josh制作
[00:05.49]好吧 他真的是个怂货
[00:06.93]//
[00:07.27]他真的是这样
[00:08.01]你知道 他们可能告诉过他
[00:08.88]你知道就在我们进来的时候
[00:09.88]Young Cutta制作
[00:10.43]当我们在加州的时 他在这里耀武扬威
[00:12.02]我们现身 他试着满怀好意地跟我们握手
[00:14.83]这是第二次 我另外告诉过他一次
[00:16.51]告诉他 我们来找他算账 让他找个地方躲起来
[00:20.57]谁告诉我死很容易
[00:25.16]谁告诉我死很容易
[00:31.08]你为什么离开我
[00:34.45]你为什么告诉我
[00:35.92]你为什么告诉我 死很容易
[00:41.24]他们不会像我们一样鲜血淋漓
[00:43.28]Sheroid是一位厉害人物
[00:45.81]真正的哥们 不是曲意逢迎的人
[00:48.36]我讨厌J Money四处逃命
[00:50.99]他就是那个挨子弹的人
[00:53.71]你觉得你无人匹敌 你拿着加长弹夹
[00:56.24]我一直单打独斗 我感觉我很独立
[00:58.89]我也爱你 可我不知道你的感受
[01:01.57]你不会告诉我 因为我知道区别
[01:04.38]我吞下止痛药 让我忘记痛苦
[01:06.99]不会结交新朋友 我身边还是那帮兄弟
[01:09.65]白手起家 你是否明白名声给我们带来的东西
[01:12.35]他们进监狱去干掉那些大佬
[01:15.70]孩子妈妈真实无比
[01:18.16]每当他们现身 我就把**藏起来
[01:20.69]我在地下室创作出《Dis Ain't What U Want》这首歌
[01:23.26]在艰苦的环境里存活下来 我成功了
[01:25.82]那个不知名的家伙闯出名堂 但是他恨之入骨
[01:28.59]我哑口无言 他们消失得无影无踪
[01:31.22]现在看看我 我对他们百般羞辱
[01:33.96]财源滚滚 我能体味到
[01:36.35]妹子投怀送抱 想与我纵享激情
[01:39.05]我和脱衣舞女郎缠绵 可我表现得手足无措
[01:41.55]看着我的孩子 我告诉他 我比你厉害
[01:44.29]我们铤而走险 一旦我们被抓住 我们就会被关进警察局
[01:46.98]我不会再说了 你穿着迪奥 你性感迷人
[01:49.56]所有敌人都很危险 可我知道一些死翘翘的家伙
[01:52.52]不要打扰我 我什么都不想说
[01:55.17]我找到自我 我不再感到怅然若失
[01:57.67]上等好货不会再让我咳嗽
[02:00.49]他们为此丢掉性命 不再是我的错
[02:03.18]他不喜欢他的街区 他不再是发号施令的人
[02:05.73]药片夺走他的性命 我不想再吃药
[02:07.80]谁告诉我死很容易
[02:11.86]谁告诉我死很容易
[02:17.80]你为什么离开我
[02:20.93]你为什么告诉我
[02:22.36]你为什么告诉我 死很容易
[02:28.04]他们不会像我们一样鲜血淋漓
[02:38.33]他们不会像我们一样鲜血淋漓
[02:49.01]他们不会像我们一样鲜血淋漓
